name: Pair_adjacentsTest
description: Unit tests for the Pair.adjacents method, which generates pairs of adjacent elements from an iterable.

test_cases.name: testAdjacentsWithEmptyIterable
test_cases.description: Tests the Pair.adjacents method with an empty iterable, ensuring no pairs are generated.

test_cases.name: testAdjacentsWithNonEmptyIterable
test_cases.description: Tests the Pair.adjacents method with a non-empty iterable, ensuring pairs of adjacent elements are correctly generated.
